w.p: This is a very simple browser-like application to show the LCUI and LCUI Router features.
LCUI is a freely available software library for building user interfaces. It is written in C and supports the use of XML and CSS to describe the graphical interface of simple desktop apps.
LCUI Router is the official router for LCUI. It provides a similar development experience to the Vue Router and make building multiple views applications with LCUI a breeze.
